channel.title: Need Advanced Help. ;) (/*SOLVED*/)
channel.description:
Oke so what i'm going to try, is making a kind of prestige system. But i dont know how to code it.
First, a npc asks you if you want to reset all your skills to 1, and get 21 Prestige Points (1 Point ea skill)
then you can select Yes,No If you click yes, it checks if all the 21 skills are 99, if not he need to say you need all skills 99 to do this.
if all the skills are 99, he need to set them to 1 and add 21 Prestige Points.
Can someone help me make this? I know the most things but stuff like checking if the skills are 99, and resetting them to 1, i dont know this stuff.
Can someone make a small tutorial for me? or help me out ;)

item.title: Need Advanced Help. ;) (/*SOLVED*/)
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

private boolean all99 = true; for (int i = 0; i < 22; i++) { if (c.playerLevel[i] != 99) { all99 = false; } } if(all99 == false) { c.sendMessage("You don't have 99 in all skills."); return; } for(int i = 0; i < 22; i++) { if(i == 3) { c.playerLevel[i] = 10; } else { c.playerLevel[i] = 1; } c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[i]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); } c.getPA().requestUpdates(); c.sendMessage("Stats reset, tokens given.");//Here you'll need to do your prestige stuff... Maybe a combat update also

Read full topic

item.description:
@DevotionPk wrote:

Thanks guys, but it does not work properly, if you dont got everything 99 it still resets Hp/str/atk/def.

I got all the dialogues working and the variables, i only need the clickingbuttons method…

Can someone help me with this?

Like it checks if all 22 stats are 99,
If they are 99, it resets them all to 1, exept for hp to 10.
It gives PrestigePoints + 22
And it sends a message Your skills has been resetted, you gain 22 Prestige points.

With a } Else{ ( if all skills arent 99,
It sendback to a dialogue that says, you need to master all skills first.

The green lines, i know to do myself, but i dont got a clue with the red ones…

plz help me out

Read full topic

item.title: Need Advanced Help. ;) (/*SOLVED*/)
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

No problem I made a mistake, mine should look like this:

for (int i = 0; i < 22; i++) { if (c.playerLevel[i] != 99) { c.sendMessage("You don't have 99 in all skills."); return; } if(i == 3) { c.playerLevel[i] = 10; } else { c.playerLevel[i] = 1; } c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[i]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); } c.getPA().requestUpdates(); c.sendMessage("Stats reset, tokens given."); //Here you'll need to do your prestige stuff... Maybe a combat update also

Read full topic

item.title: Need Advanced Help. ;) (/*SOLVED*/)
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

			[code=java]
                                 for (int i = 0; i < 22; i++) {
				if (c.playerLevel[i] != 99) {
				c.sendMessage("You don't have 99 in all skills.");
				return;
				} 
					if (i == 3) {
					c.playerLevel[i] = 10;
					c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(11);
					} else {
					c.playerLevel[i] = 1;
					c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[i]);
					}
				c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
			}
			c.getPA().requestUpdates();
			c.sendMessage("Stats reset, tokens given.");

[/code]

This is the 10/9 hp fix. Thanks for cleaning it up Ambokile.

Read full topic

Maybe a combat update also } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have 99 in all skills."); }

Read full topic

item.title: Need Advanced Help. ;) (/*SOLVED*/)
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

tyb97:

This isn’t “advanced”.

On topic, it is different for everyone yes. Like tyb said, looking at the master and setlevel commands will basically give you everything you need.

for (int i = 0; i < 22; i++) {

This loop will go through all 21 skills.

				for (int i = 0; i < 22; i++) { //Loop for skills
					if (c.playerLevel[i] != 99) { //Checks if the skills aren't 99
					c.sendMessage("You don't have 99 in all skills."); //If skills aren't 99, display this.
					return; //Return value so it doesn't continue.
					} 
					c.playerLevel[i] = 1; //Starts setting your skills to 1.
					c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(1); //Gets correct XP so it's not 1/99.
					c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); //Refreshes the skills so you don't have to log.
				}
				c.playerLevel[3] = 10; //This sets the 10hp, as it sets it to 1 in the loop.
				c.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(11); //Xp for level 11 to display the correct level.
				c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); //Refreshes skill, no need to log.
				c.getPA().requestUpdates(); //Requests  updates.
				c.sendMessage("Stats reset, tokens given."); //Custom message outside the loop given after stats are reset.
                                //Here you'll need to do your prestige stuff... Maybe a combat update also

Now just make it work how you want it.

Read full topic
